mapper.insert: insert into pay_history (patient_id, money, payment_method, time) values (#{patientId}, #{money}, #{paymentMethod}, #{time})
insert into medical_card (patient_id, balance, name) values (#{id}, #{balance}, #{name})
insert into star (name, patient_id, star, create_time) values (#{name}, #{patientId}, #{star}, #{time})
mapper.select: select doctor_name, department, department_location, create_time, price, payment_method, level, status, number, cases from orders where patient_id = #{patientId}

select doctor_name, department, department_location, create_time, price, payment_method, level, status, number, cases from orders where patient_id = #{patientId} and create_time between #{time} and now()
select id from orders where patient_id=#{patientId}
